lead_paragraph: A considerable part of Brazil's Olympic hopes will rest with its Judo team, whose four medals were the most the nation earned in any sport at the 2012 London Games.

headline.print_headline: Brazil Banking on Judokas to Boost Rio Medal Haul
headline.main: Brazil Banking on Judokas to Boost Rio Medal Haul

snippet: A considerable part of Brazil's Olympic hopes will rest with its Judo team, whose four medals were the most the nation earned in any sport at the 2012 London Games....
